Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers a free training programme for dogs to help people with physical disabilities and other medical conditions. Dogs are trained to assist with their owner's specific disabilities and, in the case of epilepsy, can give a significant alert to a seizure. Also trains dogs in skills to make life easier for their disabled owners, including opening doors, retrieval of letters, newspapers and dropped objects. Dogs are also trained to perform any other task which may improve a disabled person's independence. Also runs a training programme for Autism assistance dogs for children aged 3-10 years. Company limited by guarantee no 4190624.

category.entry: PHYSICAL IMPAIRMENT - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
